the source code that you've written and
it just looks for mistakes or things
that you've written that it doesn't
think that you meant to write so it's
quite common for example when you copy
and paste code that you accidentally
forget to change the names of certain
variables and then later down the road
of course everything will compile
everything will run but you'll run into
issues that might not be 100% apparent
